description: This file is a unit test script for testing store and auth modules, verifying view toggling and user authentication functionalities.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite grouping related tests for store and auth modules.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines individual test cases: one for toggling views and another for verifying user data from auth module.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Asserts expectations about the values returned by store methods and auth state.
